These are fading tab panes

Don't they look nice?

Useful to reduce scrolling

Collapsibles are another option for this.

You can add a background picture

Or just use these to split text into logical sections.

These are fading pill panes

Very similar to the fading tab panes.

Useful to reduce scrolling

Just like the tab panes.

You can add a background picture

Or just use these to split text into logical sections.
